title: A List of Books on Eastern Philosophy and Mindfulness
first_phrase: In this last section, we find a list of books and authors that inspired "The Tao of Chaos" by Katya Walter. We can see titles from Eastern and Western traditions, such as Zen Mind and The Embodied Mind. The author also mentions the influence of philosophers and spiritual teachers like Wilber and Venkatesananda. The section ends with Essence numbers and a reference to R.D. Laing, a psychiatrist who challenged conventional views on mental illness.
